text_block_list.text:
I can't stop thinking about Gold<n>City—that training session
along the<n>riverbank after tryouts.
I want to get to know her. But first, I<n>need to find her.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Phew. Yes, a newbest time! Now to try upping my pace...

Wouldn't want to interrupt her while<n>she's laser-focused. I
decide to wait a<n>bit, when...

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Wow, just wow! Your running never<n>fails to amaze, City!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Huh? Who're you?

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text: As you can see, I'm a trainer! And<n>I'm here to scout you!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Scout me? ...For real?!
Crap! I got scooped!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Er, I mean... Ahem.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
O-oh yeah? And? If you want to scout<n>me, aren't you going
to, like, give your<n>pitch? You know, like plans and<n>goals?

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Yes, of course! I am going to makeyou the top Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
No one will be able to take their eyes<n>off of you! The
brightest star on the<n>turf—Gold City! That's what I have in<n>
store for you!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Huh. N-not bad.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Well, how about a trial period? I<n>wouldn't mind training with
you for a<n>little while.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Oh, great! No time to waste, then. I'll<n>see you at training
tomorrow! Get<n>ready, because we've got lots to do!<n>Later!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Hey, wai— Going already?!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
That was fast. Said what he had to<n>say and dipped. No
nonsense, huh.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
No one will be able to take their eyes<n>off of me? "The
brightest star on the<n>turf"?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Argh, I can't! I literally can't!

She takes off all of a sudden.<n>Concerned, I find myself
following her.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Let's gooo! Yes, yes, yes yes yesss!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Honestly, I ran like crap that race. I<n>thought for sure I'd
have to wait till<n>next time, but no—I got scouted! Yes!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: ...Someone was watching. Actuallyseeing me.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
This is it. It all starts here. I'm going<n>to run with my own two
legs, as the<n>real me!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
G1 victory? Or even more? Bring it on!<n>This time, everyone
will know me for<n>who I really am.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
...Ugh, what am I doing off in fantasy<n>land? Fifth in tryouts is
low-key awful,<n>like actually.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Back to training... Wh-whoa!
Oops! Definitely wasn't supposed to<n>let her spot me!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Uh, hold on, you... came up to me<n>before the race. Wait,
what? So...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: You... heard all that?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: You're fricking kidding me!Eavesdropping? I can not believeyou right now!

After apologizing profusely, I explain<n>how I'd come to scout
her but ended<n>up following along when she<n>suddenly ran
off.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Oh, really now? So you were justconcerned about me, is that it?
choice_data_list: I didn't mean to eavesdrop. Please believe me...
I didn't mean to eavesdrop. Please believe me...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Sigh... Okay, okay, whatever.You're making me feel like a bully atthis point.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Just, forget everything you heard, andnot a word to anyone. Promiseme that, and you're off the hook.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: And you better not say "no<n>guarantees."

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Good, then that's that. I need to get<n>back to training, so you
go do<n>whatever.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
No use trying to scout me anymore.<n>I've already got a
trainer.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Geez, it's not a funeral. What's with<n>you?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
I swear you almost burst into tears<n>apologizing just now.
Got nothing to<n>hide, huh? Ever been told you can't<n>lie to
save your life?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: I mean, not like I really care or<n>anything.
choice_data_list:
Glad you got a trainer, though. You've got my
support!

Glad you got a trainer, though. You've got my
support!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Uh, thanks? Usually trainers support,<n>you know, their own
trainees, so not<n>sure what that's supposed to mean,<n>but...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Oh, you know what I really don't get,<n>though?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Why didn't you say anything? I<n>mean, from the way you're
talking, it<n>sounds like you were here first.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: So why'd you just let that other guy<n>swoop in?
choice_data_list:
You looked so focused, I didn't want to
interrupt.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Huh? Seriously? Haha!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Ugh. Nothing good ever comes to<n>goody-two-shoes like you,
you know.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Anyway, you can give me all the<n>support you want. I'm off.
